import React from'react';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useLocalState}from'../../utils/useLocalStorage';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';// import table from "react-bootstrap/Table";
import'./UnpaidInvoicePage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UnpaidInvoicePage(){const[data,setData]=useState({});const[isdata,setIsdata]=useState(false);const[jwt,setJwt]=useLocalState('','jwt');useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://leverpay-api.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/user/get-invoices?status=pending',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(jwt)}}).then(res=>{console.log(res.data);setData(res.data.data);if(res.data.data.length>0){setIsdata(true);}else setIsdata(false);}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);setIsdata(false);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Unpaid_con",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Unpaid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Unpaid Invoices"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"table",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Amount"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Invoice"})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"Unpaiddata",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[isdata&&data.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"table-data",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.amt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"invoices/unpaid-invoice",state:item.uuid,style:{color:"green"},children:[" ","View"]})})]},item.date);}),!isdata&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{style:{textAlign:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"You do not have any Pending Invoice."})})]})})]})});}export default UnpaidInvoicePage;
